title: MAP_VALUE_CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE
description: Returns the corresponding return value for the first compare substring found within the provided string, performing case-insensitive matching. If no substrings match, returns default return value optional. If default return value optional is omitted and no match occurs, the function returns $SKIP_ASSIGNMENT.

parameters.name: … compare_substring
parameters.description: The substring to search for within the provided string.

parameters.name: … return_value
parameters.description: The value returned if the compare substring is found.

parameters.name: default_return_value_optional
parameters.description: The value returned if no substrings match. If omitted and no match occurs, returns $SKIP_ASSIGNMENT.

examples:
MAP_VALUE_CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE(Description, "platinum", "Partner", "individual", "Person", "Business")
-- Returns "Partner" if "platinum" is found.
-- Returns "Person" if only "individual" is found.
-- Returns "Business" otherwise.
-- Case-insensitive, first match wins.

tips.text: Ensure that return_value and default_return_value_optional are of the same data type.
